messages.subject: Dead Cow, was Math experience
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/22/02 6:22:45 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/22/02 6:22:45 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Jeepers, this list is going to inspire the vegetarian in me to take over
the
omnivore in me. Between bloody eggs and hunks of cow carcass, who could
resist?!
>>

LOL!!!

Bridget was saying that people take words differently and they don't really
matter so much to her....
I have to say, there is a waitress out there that would say words matter very
much.
When I first went vegetarian we went out to eat at a local restaurant....my
then 3 y.o. ds ordered his hamburger by asking for "some dead cow" with a
smile on his face.
The waitress stood there with her mouth open, staring, while the rest of us
lost it!!
Words matter a lot.
Ren
